title: bhEda matha vAta
sahitya:
bhEda matha vAta shUdinil mayangAmal pizhaittEn unnaruLAl paramporuLE


anupallavi

  Adi sattiya vEda nIti dharumamE arindEn adanpaDi irundEn irundapaDi


caraNam    viralgaL aindinaiyum karam onru tAngumE virinda onrai uNarndAl vikArangaL nIngumE kuralgaL palavAyinum
kUTTum OmkAram onrE kUDi uLam kuvindu nADip-poruLarindu tEDit-tighaittiDAdu vIDu kaNDennuLLE
